alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 5:20AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Marion County through 615 AM EDT... At 520 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ocala Airport, or near Ocala, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Lynne, Ocala Airport, Santos, Silver Springs Shores and Burbank. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion
